title: The Buddha Tree
description: 菩提樹素食餐厅, at 中之路汇智国际商业中心5楼5-11 serves vegetarian cuisine. Offers 2 versions of the menu, one in English and one in Chinese. Has dumplings, curry, vegetables, noodles, rice, mock chicken; cookies and traditional sweets sold at the counter. Free Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 5th floor shopping mall above Jinke Rd metro station, Line 2, Exit 2, Pudong
